statements: UPDATE InfluencerAnalysis SET content_preference = 'Fashion' WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE InfluencerAnalysis SET audience_demographics = '{"age": 25, "gender": "Female"}' WHERE influencer_id = '333e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE InfluencerAnalysis SET audience_demographics = '{"gender": "Male", "age": 30}' WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE InfluencerAnalysis SET content_preference = 'Fashion', audience_demographics = '{"gender": "Female", "age": 25}' WHERE influencer_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE influencer_content_preferences SET likes_count = 100 WHERE influencer_id = 123 AND content_type = 'Fashion';
UPDATE audience_demographics SET interests = 'Music, Travel' WHERE audience_id = 456 AND influencer_id = 123;
UPDATE influencer_content_preferences SET likes_count = likes_count + 10 WHERE influencer_id = 123 AND content_type = 'Fashion'
UPDATE audience_demographics SET age = 25, location = 'New York' WHERE influencer_id = 456 AND gender = 'Female'
UPDATE influencer_preferences SET engagement_rate = 4.5 WHERE influencer_id = 101;
UPDATE audience_demographics SET age = 25, interests = 'Fashion' WHERE audience_id = 201;
UPDATE influencer_preferences SET audience_gender = 'Male' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE audience_demographics SET interests = 'Fashion, Travel' WHERE audience_id = 3;
UPDATE influencers SET followers = 100000 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE audience_demographics SET location = 'New York' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE influencers SET followers = followers + 500, content_preferences = 'Lifestyle' WHERE name = 'Alice'
UPDATE audience_interactions SET like_status = true, comment_status = true, share_status = false WHERE audience_id = 123 AND post_id = 456
UPDATE influencers SET followers_count = 5000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE audience_demographics SET age_group = '25-34', country = 'USA' WHERE influencer_id = 3;
UPDATE influencers SET location='Los Angeles', followers_count=50000 WHERE influencer_id=101;
UPDATE influencer_stats SET total_posts=100, engagement_rate=0.05 WHERE influencer_id=105;
